Stance on gun control: The expert examined Sen. Joe Manchin's stance on gun control, including his past endorsements by the NRA and his support for legislation proposing tighter background checks for certain gun purchases.
Position on higher taxes: The expert investigated whether Sen. Manchin aligns with Hillary Clinton and D.C. Democrats on the issue of higher taxes.
Views on amnesty: The expert assessed Sen. Manchin's stance on amnesty for undocumented immigrants.
Position on Planned Parenthood: The expert examined whether Sen. Manchin supports Planned Parenthood, as claimed by Republican state Attorney General Patrick Morrisey.
